name: One Day International(ODI)
description: He cracked his first ODI ton against Canada in the tri-series played in the West Indies, just before the 2007 World Cup.

name: Indian Premier League(IPL)
description: Shakib Al Hasan set a price of Rs. 2 crores for himself in IPL 2022 auction. In the previous season, he was part of Kolkata Knight Riders..

name: Bangladesh Premier League(BPL)
description: In 2021, Shakib Al Hasan Net Worth (Approximately) is 40 Million dollars Shakib Al Hasan Salary is 70 lakhs in BPL 2022.

name: Test Match
description: Shakib Al Hasan made his test debut in 2007 against India. His breakthrough came in the Test against New Zealand in Chittagong in 2008. He picked up 7/36, which to date is the best figure by a Bangladeshi bowler

name: Brand Ambassador
description: The leading global smart device brand OPPO has recently roped in the world’s no. 1 all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan as its new brand ambassador.Putting faith on the idea ‘Inspiration Ahead’, OPPO keeps the society and mankind.

name: Shakib Al Hasan TVc
description: Top Bangladeshi Commercials Featuring Shakib Al Hasan 2 Min Read By Creative Desk < Share G in angladesh's all-around cricketer, Shakib Al Hasan has made quite a name for himself  but also as the role model for many aspiring cricketers and fans alike.
